content.rendered:
Refund/Cancellation Policy

Refund and Cancellation Policy

At Smart Kids Hustle, we strive to provide valuable content in our ebooks. However, we understand that sometimes things may not work out as expected. Please review our refund and cancellation policy below.

Refund Policy

We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you are not satisfied with the ebook you bought, we offer a 7-day refund policy from the date of purchase. Here’s how it works:

  • To be eligible for a refund, you must request it within 7 days of your purchase.
  • Refunds will only be issued if the ebook has not met your expectations.
  • Please provide us with the reason for your dissatisfaction when requesting a refund to help us improve our offerings.

Once your refund request is reviewed and approved, the refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment within a few business days.

Cancellation Policy

As we sell digital products (ebooks), order cancellations are not allowed. Once the ebook has been purchased and delivered, it is considered final, and you will not be able to cancel your order.

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us at info@smartkidsbundle.com.

Thank you for your understanding and support.
